Subject: False Positive Issue
Description: Hi Team, I worked with a member of support at the beginning this month to address a false positive my users were receiving. We had set up the website segaldev.crm.dynamics.com* to be on the allow list. Despite that, they are still getting these notifications. Can you advise how we can fix this on our instance please?
What_We_Know__c:
We have scheduled a remote session for tomorrow(25.02.2025 22:30 RO time)

During today's meeting, we discussed the CAP - Deep Packet Inspection (Policy Allowlist) and Regular Expression(Policy Denylist) - where and how to use them.

The customer reopened the ticket and we scheduled a remote session in which we added more options to the Allowlist dictionary and also performed an EPP server upgrade + started the EPP client software upgrade job.
Next_Steps__c: Investigate the issue during the remote session.
Solution_Comment__c:
During today's meeting, we discussed the CAP - Deep Packet Inspection (Policy Allowlist) and Regular Expression(Policy Denylist) - where and how to use them.
Everything is now clear and this ticket can be closed.

The customer reopened the ticket and we scheduled a remote session in which we added more options to the Allowlist dictionary and also performed an EPP server upgrade + started the EPP client software upgrade job.
